Class Screening

java.lang.Object
com.example.theaterproject.Models.Screening
public class Screening extends Object
The Screening class represents information about a specific movie screening, including the movie being screened, the seat number, and the price of the screening.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private LocalDateTime
    aDateTime
    The date and time when this screening takes place.
    private Movie
    aMovie
    Represents the movie associated with a specific screening in the theater system.
    private double
    aPricePerTicket
    Represents the price of a single ticket of that screening
    private int
    aTicketCount
    Represents the seat number associated with a specific movie screening.
    private final DateTimeFormatter
    FORMATER
    Formatter used to render the date-time in toString().

  • Field Details

    • aMovie

      private Movie aMovie
      Represents the movie associated with a specific screening in the theater system. This variable stores an instance of the Movie class, which provides details about the movie such as its genre, title, director, release year, and description.

    • aTicketCount

      private int aTicketCount
      Represents the seat number associated with a specific movie screening. This variable stores an integer that corresponds to the assigned seat for a particular screening.

    • aPricePerTicket

      private double aPricePerTicket
      Represents the price of a single ticket of that screening

    • aDateTime

      private LocalDateTime aDateTime
      The date and time when this screening takes place.

    • FORMATER

      private final DateTimeFormatter FORMATER
      Formatter used to render the date-time in toString().

  • Constructor Details

    • Screening

      public Screening(Movie pMovie, int pTicketCount, double pPricePerTicket, LocalDateTime pDateTime)
      Constructs a Screening object representing a specific movie screening with details about the movie, seat number, and price.
      Parameters:
      pMovie - The movie associated with this screening.
      pTicketCount - The seat number for this screening.
      pPricePerTicket - The price of the screening.
      pDateTime - The date and time of the screening.

  • Method Details

    • getMovie

      public Movie getMovie()
      Retrieves the movie associated with this screening.
      Returns:
      the Movie object associated with this screening.

    • setMovie

      public void setMovie(Movie pMovie)
      Sets the movie for this screening.
      Parameters:
      pMovie - the movie to associate with this screening

    • getTicketCount

      public int getTicketCount()
      Retrieves the seat number associated with this screening.
      Returns:
      the seat number for this screening as an integer.

    • setTicketCount

      public void setTicketCount(int aTicketCount)
      Sets the number of tickets available for this screening.
      Parameters:
      aTicketCount - the number of tickets

    • getPricePerTicket

      public double getPricePerTicket()
      Retrieves the price of the screening.
      Returns:
      the price of the screening as a double.

    • setPricePerTicket

      Sets the price per ticket for this screening.
      Parameters:
      pPricePerTicket - the price per ticket

    • getDateTime

      public LocalDateTime getDateTime()
      Retrieves the date and time of this screening.

      the LocalDateTime of this screening

    • setDateTime

      public void setDateTime(LocalDateTime pDateTime)
      Sets the date and time for this screening.
      Parameters:
      pDateTime - the LocalDateTime to set

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the Screening object, including the title of the movie associated with the screening, the seat number, and the price.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string containing the movie title, seat number, and price separated by spaces.
